titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore and increase the deduction for the health insurance costs of self-employed individuals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/29/1994--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent, and to increase to 100 percent, the deduction for the health insurance costs of self-employed individuals.
